Description: The NPA or Area Code
What type of code is this NPA (Easily Recognizable Code, General Purpose Code)
Is this NPA assignable (Yes/No)
Is the NPA is not assignable (no in previous field), this is the reason it is not assignable
Is the NPA reserved for the relief of another NPA (Yes/No)
Is the NPA assigned for use (Yes/No)
What date was the assignment made
What is the Use of this code (N - nongeograpic; G - Geographic)
The geographic location to which the code is assigned (AL, TX, Manitoba, etc.)
The country to which the assignment was made (US, CANADA, BAHAMAS, etc.)
Is this NPA in service (Yes/No)
What date was this NPA placed in service
The status of the NPA relief activity (Active, Postponed, Suspended)
The Planning Letter Number(s) about this NPA
Is this NPA part of an overlay (Yes/No)
If this NPA is part of an overlay complex, what is the overlay complex (214/469/972; 212/646/917; etc.)
What was the parent NPA, that from which this NPA split.
Special annotation for services accomodated by this NPA
The predominant time zone (s) for this NPA (A - Atlantic; E- Eastern; C - Central; P - Pacific; etc)
A map of the NPA can be found with this Planning Letter (ex.: 342; 288, etc.)
Yes or 'blank'
For General Purpose Codes, has relief planning begun (Yes/No)
Predominant dialing pattern on Home NPA Local Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits)
Predominant dialing pattern on Home NPA Toll Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits; 1+7D - one plus seven digits; 1+10D - one plus ten digits)
Predominant dialing pattern on Foreign NPA Local Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits; 1+7D - one plus seven digits; 1+10D - one plus ten digits)
Predominant dialing pattern on Foreign NPA Toll Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits; 1+7D - one plus seven digits; 1+10D - one plus ten digits)
Permissive dialing pattern on Home NPA Local Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits)
Permissive dialing pattern on Home NPA Toll Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits; 1+7D - one plus seven digits)
Permissive dialing pattern on Foreign NPA Local Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits)
Miscellaneous notes on the dialing plan for the specified NPA
